name: Assertion Type Wise Test Cases
query:
select
(ort.r+oft.f+owt.w +orvt.rv+oet.e) as 'Total Assertions',
ort.r as 'RESPONSE',
oft.f as 'FIELD VALUE',
owt.w AS 'WORKFLOW',
orvt.rv AS 'RECORD VALIDATION',
oet.e AS 'ERROR'

from 
( select count(*) as 'r' from (select count(tc.name) as 'r' from `tabTest Suite` ts join  `tabTestcase Item` ti on ti.parent=ts.name join `tabTest Case` tc on tc.name=ti.testcase inner join `tabAssertion` a on a.parent=tc.name where a.assertion_type='RESPONSE' group by a.name) dr ) ort
 join
( select count(*) as 'f' from (select count(tc.name) as 'f' from `tabTest Suite` ts join  `tabTestcase Item` ti on ti.parent=ts.name join `tabTest Case` tc on tc.name=ti.testcase inner join `tabAssertion` a on a.parent=tc.name where a.assertion_type='FIELD VALUE' group by a.name) df) oft
 join
(select count(*) as 'w' from (select count(tc.name) as 'w' from `tabTest Suite` ts join  `tabTestcase Item` ti on ti.parent=ts.name join `tabTest Case` tc on tc.name=ti.testcase inner join `tabAssertion` a on a.parent=tc.name where a.assertion_type='WORKFLOW' group by a.name) dw) owt
 join
(select count(*) 'rv' from (select count(tc.name) as 'rv' from `tabTest Suite` ts join  `tabTestcase Item` ti on ti.parent=ts.name join `tabTest Case` tc on tc.name=ti.testcase inner join `tabAssertion` a on a.parent=tc.name where a.assertion_type='RECORD VALIDATION' group by a.name) drv) orvt
 join
(select count(*) as 'e' from (select count(tc.name) as 'e' from `tabTest Suite` ts join  `tabTestcase Item` ti on ti.parent=ts.name join `tabTest Case` tc on tc.name=ti.testcase inner join `tabAssertion` a on a.parent=tc.name where a.assertion_type='ERROR' group by a.name) de) oet
